analysis.description:
TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#317-327) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#322-324)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#333-341) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#334-335)

DiscoperiTokenLockup.balanceLockedUp (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#491-498) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- lockedup[_who][i].release > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#495-498)

DiscoperiTokenLockup._lockup (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#501-525) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(_release > block.timestamp,Lockup release time should be > now.) (/unique_chucks/32/0xc7b292092542a34021afe23bf7162b006d7c219c.sol#517-518)

elements.expression: require(bool,string)(_release > block.timestamp,Lockup release time should be > now.)
